td.content: s:patient complains of Body Aches and other medical problems. s:pt presents with 8 months history of Body Aches. he is a 74 year old white M. o:Height 64 in, Weight 233 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered B burgdorferi IgG Serum.

s:pt complains of Body Aches x 5 weeks.
